Sport.ini.soccer.name: Soccer
Sport.ini.soccer.description: Soccer is a sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball.
Sport.ini.hockey.name: Ice hockey
Sport.ini.hockey.description: Ice hockey is a team sport played on ice, in which skaters use sticks to direct a puck into the opposing team's goal.
Sport.ini.basketball.name: Basketball
Sport.ini.basketball.description: Basketball is a team sport in which two teams of five players try to score points by throwing a ball through the top of a basketball hoop while following a set of rules.
